from IPython.display import clear_output
!pip3 install rx
clear_output()

import numpy as np

import rx
from rx import of,operators as op 
import operator

import requests
import json
source.eaa5c110:
url = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1'

resp = requests.get(url=url)
data = resp.json() 

print(data)

of(data).pipe(
    op.map(lambda x : x.get("title"))
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = ",x),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = ",e),
    on_completed = lambda : print("completed")
)

data[:3]
source.20f61fe3:
of(data).pipe(
    op.map(lambda x : np.array(x))
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = ",x),
    on_error = lambda e : print("error = ",e),
    on_completed = lambda : print("completed")
)
